# Assignment Markdown Structure Guidelines

## 1. Template Usage
- Har bir assignment [`templates/assignment-template.md`](../../templates/assignment-template.md) strukturasiga amal qilishi kerak
- Assignment `README.md` bo‘lishi shart
- Template’dagi majburiy bo‘limlarni o‘chirmang yoki tashlamang

## 2. Section Guidance
- **Title**: qisqa va tushunarli nom (`Python Basics`, `Loops and Conditionals`, `Functions and Modules`)
- **Objective**: 1-2 gapda o‘quvchi nimani o‘rganishini yozing
- **Tasks**:
  - Har bir taskga aniq nom bering
  - Description’da o‘quvchi nima qilishi kerak aniq yozilsin
  - Requirements’da natijalarni punktlar bilan yozing, aniq va o‘lchanadigan bo‘lsin
  - Kerak bo‘lsa, misol input/output code block ichida berilsin

- Qo‘shimcha bo‘limlarni faqat ruxsat berilgan hollarda qo‘shing
